derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin pict- 'painted' (from the verb pingere) + -graph

entry.def: A pictogram is a simple drawing that represents something. Pictograms were used as the earliest form of writing.

means.word_mean: 1. a graphic character used in picture writing
